-- | Basic deployment support for project management tool.
--   
@package rivet-simple-deploy
@version 0.1.0.0

module Rivet.Lib.SimpleDeploy
tasks :: [Task]
deployMigrate :: String -> Config -> t -> Action ()
deployMigrateStatus :: String -> Config -> t -> Action ()
deployMigrateDown :: String -> Config -> t -> Action ()
deployStatus :: String -> Config -> t -> Action ()
deployRollout :: String -> Config -> t -> Action ()
deployRollback :: String -> Config -> [String] -> Action ()
deployStage :: String -> Config -> [String] -> Action ()
